metadata.title: CVE-2021-3575 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow was found in openjpeg in color.c:379:42 insycc420_to_rgb when decompressing a crafted .j2k file. An attacker coulduse this to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the applicationcompiled against openjpeg.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
